Posts.EditableText: It's been forever since I've touched Quest, I'm looking forward to fiddling around with it. Quest 4 hasn't changed much so you should still be fine there. Quest 5 is a totally new system, so although you'll be able to [i:11c3kjim]play[/i:11c3kjim] your old games and examples, you won't be able to [i:11c3kjim]edit[/i:11c3kjim] them.

You [i:11c3kjim]can[/i:11c3kjim] install both Quest 4 and 5 on the same system though.
